/usr/bin/gcc  -fPIC  -msse -W -Wall  -O2 -g   -shared -Wl,-soname,liballegro_acodec.so.5.0 -o ../../lib/liballegro_acodec.so.5.0.10 CMakeFiles/allegro_acodec.dir/acodec.c.o CMakeFiles/allegro_acodec.dir/wav.c.o CMakeFiles/allegro_acodec.dir/helper.c.o ../../lib/liballegro_audio.so.5.0.10 ../../lib/liballegro.so.5.0.10 -lm -lpthread -lSM -lICE -lX11 -lXext -lXcursor -lXinerama -lXrandr -lGL -lGLU -Wl,-rpath,/home/anhong/Downloads/allegro/b/lib:
